interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: In the Line of Fire
Review Date: 2016/10/13
Categories: Suspense, Drama, Emotional, Gritty
Product Description: ['A veteran Secret Service agent, haunted by his failure to protect John F. Kennedy from assassination, gets a chance to redeem himself thirty years later through a battle of wits with a brilliant psychopath who threatens to kill the current president.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Wolfgang Petersen'], 'Producers': ['Jeff Apple'], 'Starring': ['Clint Eastwood', 'John Malkovich', 'Rene Russo']}
Review Text: As somebody else has defined it, this is a thinking man's thriller. Great performances by John Malkovich, Clint Eastwood and Rene Russo. Also a rare instance in which Eastwood stars in a movie not directed or produced by him.
Review Title: A thinking man's thriller
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Don't get me wrong, I like DA very much. Who would not like Maggie Smith's character, or the beautiful daughters or the British accent. But in in the end this is just another melodrama. Only a very fine one. Enjoy while it lasts.
Top Level Telenovela

Wright', 'Jeff Bleckner', 'David Barrett', 'Kate Woods', 'Larry Shaw']}
I am literally hooked on Castle. I watch reruns all the time. It's probably not the best TV series ever made but it's highly entertaining, witty and it also has it's serious moments, when meaningful things are said. Plus it has Stana Katic, whom I think is one of the most beautiful women on TV right now.
Hooked on Castle

Very well acted, witty lines and twisted plots. Stana Katic is absolutely beautiful and has the right chemistry with Nathan Fillion.
I love this show!
{'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Gianna Smart', 'Martin Bruestle'], 'Starring': ['James Gandolfini', 'Edie Falco', 'Lorraine Bracco']}
I was a fan of The Sopranos from the start. For personal reasons that are too complicated to explain I missed the second half of the last season. Now, as a Prime member, I had the opportunity to watch the whole season again. I am still a fan, and as controversial as  it was at the time, I like the finale. Whatever happened to Tony and his family is left to the imagination of the viewer and we can think of any future we want for him without being disappointed. It was also bittersweet to see James Gandolfini delivering a perfect Tony. It is sad to realize the we will never see him again. Rest in peace James and thank you for Tony.
The show the redefined how we see mobsters

Dona Flor and Her Two Husbands
Sonia Braga, Jose Wilker  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Comedy
['Directed by Bruno Baretto staring Sonia Braga BRAZIL (in Portugese with Eng ST)T his Brazilian comedy, based on the novel by leading Brazilian author Jorge Amado, follows the strange events that befall Dona Flor after the death of her wild, irresponsible husband. Attempting to marry more wisely the second time around, she weds a stable but boring pharmacist, only to be visited by the sexy ghost of her late husband']

profile:
The user exhibits a deep appreciation for high-quality television and film, favoring character-driven narratives infused with emotional depth and humor. Their recent interactions reveal a strong affinity for suspenseful dramas that unfold complex character dynamics, emphasizing themes of redemption and moral dilemmas. This aligns with their established preference for emotionally resonant stories that maintain impact even upon multiple viewings.

Their latest engagement with thought-provoking thrillers highlights a dedication to narratives that provoke reflection and stimulate intellectual discourse, reinforcing their commitment to significant thematic exploration and culturally rich storytelling. The user is particularly drawn to performances that showcase intricate character studies, valuing portrayals that resonate on a personal level.

Through their interactions, they demonstrate an ongoing quest for captivating narratives across various forms of media, seeking content that offers both enjoyment and a lasting emotional impression. Their continued exploration of thrilling narratives further underscores their passion for well-crafted characters and compelling storytelling, ensuring a meaningful contribution to their viewing experiences and encouraging deep emotional connections with the characters and themes presented. Overall, the user remains dedicated to narratives that blend intellectual engagement with emotional richness, continually seeking out high-caliber stories that resonate profoundly.
